original_title: The House of a Thousand Candles
overview: The story of diplomatic courier Tony Carleton, who's been entrusted with a secret message vital to the cause of International peace. En route to Geneva by train, Tony is drugged by sexy cabaret dancer Raquel, who promptly steals the message -- only to be murdered by sinister master spy Sebastian, owner of a posh gambling casino known as The House of a Thousand Candles.
tagline: A beautiful spy nearly led to his undoing!! Suspense!! Drama!! Action!! Love!!
title: The House of a Thousand Candles
